I also installed patch again just oin case is always a dead blank screen ...

Make sure if you delete the pkg file (it's Assassin's Creed 1) that you only delete the file and not the folder it was in. Deleting the folder will give stop the game from running.

For reference the folder is usr_dirASSASSIN_ISO
Thank you very much it works with external kmeaw 3.55 with this fix. http://rghost.net/39824463 will have to remove the underscore as well: _BLES01467-Asassin cred Rev BLES01467-Asassin cred Rev.

tested and works on kmeaw 3.55

1. use the patch wildesy5 provided to patch the game.

2. full fix (desmon journey will work): 

download and install game update BLES01466 ver1.04 

now download http://rghost.net/40332058 and replace the files in /dev_hdd0/game/BLES01467 directory. 

fixed desmond journey
